original_text: And they brought him on horses; and he was buried in Jerusalem with his fathers in the city of David.
korean_text: 그 시체를 말에 실어다가 예루살렘에서 그의 조상들과 함께 다윗 성에 장사하니라

sentences.original_text: And they brought him on horses
and he was buried in Jerusalem
with his fathers in the city of David.
